rows.label: qst100605_msg0002
rows.name:
While you were working hard,
Nilny was thinking, mo.

rows.label: qst100605_msg0003
rows.name:
As befits the Audit Bureau, we
must interrogate Bahn, mo!

rows.label: qst100605_msg0004
rows.name:
I'll wield my authority and
make him confess how to open
the treasure chest, mo!

rows.label: qst100605_msg0005
rows.name:
...But the Bahn of today won't
listen to a word Nilny says, mo.

rows.label: qst100605_msg0006
rows.name:
He's completely underestimating
me, mo! I'm so angry, mo!

rows.label: qst100605_msg0007
rows.name: Could I ask you to do it, mo?

rows.label: qst100605_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm sorry to burden you with
such a difficult task, mo...

rows.label: qst100605_msg0009
rows.name:
Bahn is undergoing the punishment
of spinning around all day, mo.

rows.label: qst100605_msg0010
rows.name:
He can't talk for long, so
please get the information
out of him quickly, mo!

rows.label: qst100605_msg0101
rows.name:
Please guide him skillfully and
get him to tell you how to open
the treasure chest, mo!

rows.label: qst100605_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you get Bahn to tell you how
to open the treasure chest, mo?

rows.label: qst100605_msg0202
rows.name:
An Ether Bottle, a Filament
Globe, a Key-Shaped Lever...

rows.label: qst100605_msg0203
rows.name:
So you have to fit these three
into the treasure chest, mo? What
a complicated mechanism, mo!

rows.label: qst100605_msg0204
rows.name:
I've heard of them, but as
for where to get them...

rows.label: qst100605_msg0205
rows.name:
I'm sorry for everything, mo.
I'm counting on you, mo.

rows.label: qst100605_msg0301
rows.name:
Please collect one Ether
Bottle, one Filament Globe,
and one Key-Shaped Lever, mo.

rows.label: qst100605_msg0302
rows.name:
The information Nilny has doesn't
say where to get them, mo...
